long_description: Pedro's developed this environmentally benign, water-based bike wash to work on the entire bike. With special foaming action, the surfactants of Green Fizz coat the bike and help wash away the toughest dirt. Can be used with or without water. Created for use in the sloppiest of conditions; will not harm flora or fauna.
short_description: Pedro's developed this environmentally benign, water-based bike wash to work on the entire bike.
